## Effect of MDD on digit span forward

### Viz

#### Box plot

##### Basic 
```{r}
boxplot(digit_span_forward ~ group, data)
```

##### Advanced (more powerful)
```{r}
ggplot(
    data,
    aes(x = group, y = digit_span_forward)
) +
geom_boxplot()
```
